channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jensen Huang crushed the quantum stocks, and now Martin Shkreli is going for the kill
item.description: So-called ‘Pharma Bro’ says he’s short the likes of Rigetti Computing as market resembles the dotcom bubble

item.title: Hot U.S. Labor Market Boosts Dollar
item.description: The dollar rallied as U.S. December payrolls were 256,000, blowing past the consensus estimate.

item.title: Constellation Brands’ stock slides as CEO cites ‘uncertainty’ about consumer spending
item.description: The parent of the Modelo and Corona beer brands lowered its 2025 outlook, despite third-quarter profit growth.

item.title: Tilray’s stock slumps as cannabis and beer maker plans to cut its drinks lineup
item.description: The beer and cannabis company’s revenue fell short of analyst estimates.

item.title: Trump's Potential Top Banking Regulators Tease Lighter Regulatory Touch
item.description: FDIC Vice Chairman Travis Hill will call for no change in capital requirements for the largest banks in his Friday speech.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Extend Weather-Driven Gains
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures rose for a third-straight session, with January weather raising demand and locking in some production.

item.title: Treasury Yields Jump After Strong Jobs Data
item.description: U.S. Treasury yields gained, led by shorter-term maturities, as investors further reduced bets on rate cuts this year after a surprisingly strong Dece...

item.title: High five or high dive? What we know about stock returns in years ending in ‘5’.
item.description: History suggests that 5 is the market’s lucky number — just don’t bet on it.

item.title: Constellation Energy Agrees to Buy Calpine for $16.4 Billion
item.description: The merger combines two of the country’s largest power generators as demand for electricity surges.

item.title: Constellation to buy Calpine for $16 billion in deal combining nuclear, natural gas
item.description: Constellation Energy — the electricity provider whose stock has doubled over the last year on hopes it’ll help meet the voracious energy demand from a...
